Posts.Content: sherilyn wrote: has anyone opted out of radiation after a lumpectomy? i had lumpectomy w/ breast reduction-developed a wound that was quite big after 7 weeks needed another operation to close the wound after 2weeks from that surgery wound reoppened, which means i am 12 weeks after my original surgery. & can't do anything but wait- on tamoxifen, thinking i do not want rad. has anyone had this problem? Dx 12/15/2010, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/7 nodes, PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: radiation/wound healing sherilyn sherilyn
